testWarning.title: ðŸš€ Welcome to Relif Beta!
testWarning.message: You're experiencing our platform in beta testing. We're working hard to make it amazing for you and will soon bring exciting new features and a completely renovated design for a better user experience. Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you at matt@relifaid.org

root.title: Get Started Now
root.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access our account
